summary: Diff implements an in-board pawn promotion overlay UI, exposes/uses pending promotion state in the game hook (blocking interaction until resolved), adds AI auto-promotion behavior, and updates chess rules for pawn attack detection plus broader rules/draw validation. Diff also includes several unrelated UI/AI/3D rendering enhancements not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed AI evaluation feature (evaluationToWinProbability logistic mapping) not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on pawn promotion flow and rules/draw validation; it does not request changes to AI evaluation or win-probability conversion logic.

hallucinated_features.description: 3D piece mesh redesign and visual/material changes (e.g., knight geometry, black piece top accent color, enhanced lighting) not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to redesign unrelated UI flows beyond what is necessary for promotion overlay; 3D model/visual redesign is unrelated to promotion overlay/rules validation.

hallucinated_features.description: 2D/3D board last-move highlighting and animation/visual tuning not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of promotion overlay or rules/draw validation requirements; appears to be additional UX/visual enhancement.

hallucinated_features.description: GameStatusBar label renames (e.g., Difficulty/Mode naming changes) not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include avoiding unrelated UI flow redesign; status bar labeling changes are not required to support promotion overlay.
